1: כְּדַבֵּ֤ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>669 </sup> <n>When Ephraim</n> רְתֵ֔ת <sup>7578 </sup> <n>trembling</n> נָשָׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>he exalted</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>himself</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>himself in Israel</n> וַיֶּאְשַׁ֥ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>but when he offended</n> בַּבַּ֖עַל <sup>1168 </sup> <n>in Baal</n> וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he died</n>
2: וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> יוֹסִ֣פוּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>more and more</n> לַחֲטֹ֗א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>And now they sin</n> וַיַּעְשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and have made</n> לָהֶם֩ מַסֵּכָ֨ה <sup>4541 </sup> <n>them molten images</n> מִכַּסְפָּ֤ם <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of their silver</n> כִּתְבוּנָם֙ <sup>8394 </sup> <n>according to their own understanding</n> עֲצַבִּ֔ים <sup>6091 </sup> <n>[and] idols</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>all of it the work</n> חָרָשִׁ֖ים <sup>2796 </sup> <n>of the craftsmen</n> כֻּלֹּ֑ה <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> לָהֶם֙ הֵ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> אֹמְרִ֔ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>they say</n> זֹבְחֵ֣י <sup>2076 </sup> <n>that sacrifice</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of them Let the men</n> עֲגָלִ֖ים <sup>5695 </sup> <n>the calves</n> יִשָּׁקֽוּן׃ <sup>5401 </sup> <n>kiss</n>
3: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> יִֽהְיוּ֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כַּעֲנַן־ <sup>6051 </sup> <n>cloud</n> בֹּ֔קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>Therefore they shall be as the morning</n> וְכַטַּ֖ל <sup>2919 </sup> <n>dew</n> מַשְׁכִּ֣ים <sup>7925 </sup> <n>and as the early</n> הֹלֵ֑ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that passeth away</n> כְּמֹץ֙ <sup>4671 </sup> <n>as the chaff</n> יְסֹעֵ֣ר <sup>5590 </sup> <n>[that] is driven with the whirlwind</n> מִגֹּ֔רֶן <sup>1637 </sup> <n>out of the floor</n> וּכְעָשָׁ֖ן <sup>6227 </sup> <n>and as the smoke</n> מֵאֲרֻבָּֽה׃ <sup>699 </sup> <n>out of the chimney</n>
4: וְאָנֹכִ֛י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Yet I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>from the land</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וֵאלֹהִ֤ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>no god</n> זֽוּלָתִי֙ <sup>2108 </sup> <n>but me</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were not</n> תֵדָ֔ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and thou shalt know</n> וּמוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>for [there is] no saviour</n> אַ֖יִן <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> בִּלְתִּֽי׃ <sup>1115 </sup> <n>beside me</n>
5: אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְדַעְתִּ֖יךָ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I did know</n> בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>thee in the wilderness</n> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> תַּלְאֻבֽוֹת׃ <sup>8514 </sup> <n>of great drought</n>
6: כְּמַרְעִיתָם֙ <sup>4830 </sup> <n>According to their pasture</n> וַיִּשְׂבָּ֔עוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>so were they filled</n> שָׂבְע֖וּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>they were filled</n> וַיָּ֣רָם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>was exalted</n> לִבָּ֑ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and their heart</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> שְׁכֵחֽוּנִי׃ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>therefore have they forgotten</n>
7: וָאֱהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָהֶ֖ם כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>will be like</n> שָׁ֑חַל <sup>7826 </sup> <n>Therefore I will be unto them as a lion</n> כְּנָמֵ֖ר <sup>5246 </sup> <n>as a leopard</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> אָשֽׁוּר׃ <sup>7789 </sup> <n>will I observe</n>
8: אֶפְגְּשֵׁם֙ <sup>6298 </sup> <n>I will meet</n> כְּדֹ֣ב <sup>1677 </sup> <n>them as a bear</n> שַׁכּ֔וּל <sup>7909 </sup> <n>[that is] bereaved</n> וְאֶקְרַ֖ע <sup>7167 </sup> <n>[of her whelps] and will rend</n> סְג֣וֹר <sup>5458 </sup> <n>the caul</n> לִבָּ֑ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>of their heart</n> וְאֹכְלֵ֥ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>and there will I devour</n> שָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> כְּלָבִ֔יא <sup>3833 </sup> <n>them like a lion</n> חַיַּ֥ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>beast</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>the wild</n> תְּבַקְּעֵֽם׃ <sup>1234 </sup> <n>shall tear</n>
9: שִֽׁחֶתְךָ֥ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>thou hast destroyed</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בִ֥י בְעֶזְרֶֽךָ׃ <sup>5828 </sup> <n>thyself but in me [is] thine help</n>
10: אֱהִ֤י <sup>165 </sup> <n>I will</n> מַלְכְּךָ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>be thy king</n> אֵפ֔וֹא <sup>645 </sup> <n>where</n> וְיוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֖ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>[is any other] that may save</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עָרֶ֑יךָ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>your cities</n> וְשֹׁ֣פְטֶ֔יךָ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and your judges</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of whom</n> אָמַ֔רְתָּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>of whom thou saidst</n> תְּנָה־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> לִּ֖י מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>me a king</n> וְשָׂרִֽים׃ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>captain</n>
11: אֶֽתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I gave</n> לְךָ֥ מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>thee a king</n> בְּאַפִּ֔י <sup>639 </sup> <n>in mine anger</n> וְאֶקַּ֖ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> בְּעֶבְרָתִֽי׃ <sup>5678 </sup> <n>[him] away in my wrath</n> ס
12: צָרוּר֙ <sup>6887 </sup> <n>[is] bound up</n> עֲוֹ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>The iniquity</n> אֶפְרָ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> צְפוּנָ֖ה <sup>6845 </sup> <n>[is] hid</n> חַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>his sin</n>
13: חֶבְלֵ֥י <sup>2256 </sup> <n>The sorrows</n> יֽוֹלֵדָ֖ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>of a travailing woman</n> יָבֹ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> ל֑וֹ הוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בֵן֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> חָכָ֔ם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>upon him he [is] an unwise</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>is not</n> עֵ֥ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>long</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יַעֲמֹ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>for he should not stay</n> בְּמִשְׁבַּ֥ר <sup>4866 </sup> <n>in [the place of] the breaking forth</n> בָּנִֽים׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of children</n>
14: מִיַּ֤ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them from the power</n> שְׁאוֹל֙ <sup>7585 </sup> <n>of the grave</n> אֶפְדֵּ֔ם <sup>6299 </sup> <n>I will ransom</n> מִמָּ֖וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>them from death</n> אֶגְאָלֵ֑ם <sup>1350 </sup> <n>I will redeem</n> אֱהִ֨י <sup>165 </sup> <n>I will</n> דְבָרֶיךָ֜ <sup>1698 </sup> <n>be thy plagues</n> מָ֗וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>O death</n> אֱהִ֤י <sup>165 </sup> <n>I will</n> קָֽטָבְךָ֙ <sup>6987 </sup> <n>be thy destruction</n> שְׁא֔וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>O grave</n> נֹ֖חַם <sup>5164 </sup> <n>repentance</n> יִסָּתֵ֥ר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>shall be hid</n> מֵעֵינָֽי׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>from mine eyes</n>
15: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בֵּ֥ן <sup>996 </sup> <n>among</n> אַחִ֖ים <sup>251 </sup> <n>among [his] brethren</n> יַפְרִ֑יא <sup>6500 </sup> <n>Though he be fruitful</n> יָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> קָדִים֩ <sup>6921 </sup> <n>an east wind</n> ר֨וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the wind</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מִמִּדְבָּ֣ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>from the wilderness</n> עֹלֶ֗ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>shall come up</n> וְיֵב֤וֹשׁ <sup>954 </sup> <n>shall become dry</n> מְקוֹרוֹ֙ <sup>4726 </sup> <n>and his spring</n> וְיֶחֱרַ֣ב <sup>2717 </sup> <n>shall be dried up</n> מַעְיָנ֔וֹ <sup>4599 </sup> <n>and his fountain</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>It</n> יִשְׁסֶ֔ה <sup>8154 </sup> <n>he shall spoil</n> אוֹצַ֖ר <sup>214 </sup> <n>the treasure</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of every</n> כְּלִ֥י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>vessels</n> חֶמְדָּֽה׃ <sup>2532 </sup> <n>of all pleasant</n>
16: תֶּאְשַׁם֙ <sup>816 </sup> <n>shall become desolate</n> שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>Samaria</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מָרְתָ֖ה <sup>4784 </sup> <n>for she hath rebelled</n> בֵּֽאלֹהֶ֑יהָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>against her God</n> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> יִפֹּ֔לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>they shall fall</n> עֹלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>5768 </sup> <n>their infants</n> יְרֻטָּ֔שׁוּ <sup>7376 </sup> <n>shall be dashed in pieces</n> וְהָרִיּוֹתָ֖יו <sup>2030 </sup> <n>and their women with child</n> יְבֻקָּֽעוּ׃ <sup>1234 </sup> <n>shall be ripped up</n> פ
